title: Keep Them Warm
description: Provide cozy blankets, sweaters, or jackets to keep your pets warm during cold days.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Avoid long exposure to cold weather. Short walks are better in winter.

title: Winter Grooming
description: Regular grooming prevents matting and keeps their coat healthy in cold weather.

title: Protect Paws
description: Use paw balm or pet boots to protect their feet from ice, snow, and salt.

title: Hydration & Nutrition
description: Ensure pets drink enough water and maintain a nutritious diet to stay energetic.

title: Safe Heating
description: Provide safe heating options, like heated beds or pads, but avoid electric cords they can chew.
